title: Yes4All Premium Surf Balance Board Trainer with Adjustable Stoppers - 3 Different Distance Options for Improve Balance, Build Strength & Surf Trainer

Whether you're a surfer, snowboarder, skier, skateboarder, or just looking to improve your balance and strength, this trainer is perfect for you. Made with 15-ply pressed premium wood and a weight capacity of 350lbs, this trainer also offers a comfortable grip surface and smooth movement roller for a seamless workout experience.
